noun.description: A liquid preparation containing detergent or soap for washing the hair.
examples: he smelt clean, of soap and shampoo

verb.description: Wash or clean (something, especially the hair) with shampoo.
examples: Dolly was sitting in the bath shampooing her hair

origin: Mid 18th century (in the sense massage (as part of a Turkish bath process)): from Hindi cāṃpo! press!, imperative of cāṃpnā.
